channel.title: Trying to make chatbox say playerRights

item.title: Trying to make chatbox say playerRights
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Why not just do,

        public void Status() {
                if (playerRights == 0) {
                sM("Your status currently set as: Normal player");
                }
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                sM("Your status is currently set as: Mod");
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                sM("Your status is currently set as: Administrator");
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                sM("Your status is currently set as: Owner/co-owner");
                }
                if (playerRights == 4) {
                sM("Your status is currently set as: Hidden admin");
                }
        }

Why are you trying to go through all that trouble for something you could do a lot easier.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to make chatbox say playerRights

item.title: Trying to make chatbox say playerRights
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

not sure what ive done wrong here but take a look

public void Status() { if (playerRights == 0) { sM("Your status currently set as: "+playerRights0+""); } if (playerRights == 1) { sM("Your status is currently set as: "+playerRights1+""); } if (playerRights == 2) { sM("Your status is currently set as: "+playerRights2+""); } if (playerRights == 3) { sM("Your status is currently set as: "+playerRights3+""); } if (playerRights == 4) { sM("Your status is currently set as: "+playerRights4+""); } }

public String playerRights0[] = {"normal player"}; public String playerRights1[] = {"moderator"}; public String playerRights2[] = {"administraitor"}; public String playerRights3[] = {"owner/co-owner"}; public String playerRights4[] = {"hidden admin"};

sM("Welcome to ----------: "+playerName+"!"); sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!"); Status();the result isâ€¦
